attributes.action: Prevent a critical spread of COVID19 by asking the UK population to self-isolate
attributes.background: The government should impose self-isolation in order to prevent a wider spread of coronavirus

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that everyone should stay at home to prevent the spread of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
